name: Aphel Is
description:
Journey across the land of Fahl where all
individuals are bound to cursed souls known as Era.
To free themselves and become "Pyur", they must find their
Eternal Song.

• Intense song-based action battles, including an exciting Symphony Mode
• Strategic, collectible card mini-game
• Interchange allies and summon powerful beasts
• An engaging, fully-voiced storyline
• Multi-tier class system with ability to power up all skills
